title: Certified Qualifications via NFTs
description: When recruiting, we accept people's history, experience & quals. We may crosscheck these, but the process is slow & open to corruption.

f6_assessments.q0: Creating a platform and using NFTs to represent qualifications addresses the challenge brief of creating business models with NFT's at the core. Minting and using NFTs to tokenize qualifications will increase the use and number of NFTs on Cardano, thus increasing utility and providing value to the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: I feel the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would like to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team work history, education and past experiences. I would like the team to expand on the responsibilities and deliverables of each member of the team, this allows insight on whether there is a work overload in one area. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed".
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a minimal roadmap and budget. I would like to see the team develop Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) for the project based on a monthly timetable and connect the KPIs to milestones on the project roadmap (timeline). I would like to see the team create a solid roadmap -  develop and add milestones to provide deeper detail, set technical development milestones for creating the product. I would like to see the budget developed beyond a single line entry and broken down into monthly spending, and I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the developers must provide and when must they deliver the tasks – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the spending - thus the team can track performance and spending over a timeline. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be challenging to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: Certification of qualifications is clearly a nascent use case of NFTs. This proposal is for an initial 3 months of research to build prototypes and develop a customer aquisition plan, but does not include a working product.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers did not provide specific credentials or experience beyond 'decades of experience delivering innovation.' This initial phase of the project has modest goals, but i question the ability of the team to deliver future phases of the project or achieve widespread adoption.
f6_assessments.q2: The phase 0 has a budget of 10K and its deliverables are proofs of concept and a user acquisition strategy. delivery of these should be easy to confirm or dis confirm.

solution: Imagine a universal system-agnostic way to provide validated certifications, qualifications and work experience using NFTs.
experience: We are a team with decades of experience in delivering innovation to business through the use of digital solutions.
